mapper.insert: insert into open_account (user_id, oauth_type, open_id, nickname, gender, avatar, create_time, city, province, location, home) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oauthType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{home,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update open_account set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, oauth_type = #{oauthType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, home = #{home,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, oauth_type, open_id, nickname, gender, avatar, create_time, city, province, location, home from open_account where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, oauth_type, open_id, nickname, gender, avatar, create_time, city, province, location, home from open_account
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM open_account WHERE open_id = #{openId} AND oauth_type = #{oauthType}
delete from open_account where oauth_type=#{oauthType} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, oauth_type, open_id, nickname, gender, avatar, create_time, city, province, location, home from open_account where user_id = #{userId}
